Interface GroundInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ModelInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IRobotInterface

    public interface GroundInterface
extends ModelInterface
    The interface for communicating with zero-point ground robots.
    See Also:
    ModelInterface

      void sendCurve(int velocity, int radius)
      Instructs the robot to make an arcing turn.

      Instructs the robot to stop, cancelling previous instructions.

      • sendCurve

        void sendCurve(int velocity,
               int radius)
        Instructs the robot to make an arcing turn.
        Parameters:
        velocity - the speed at which to move
        radius - the turn radius of the curve

      • sendStraight

        void sendStraight(int velocity)
        Instructs the robot to move straight forward.
        Parameters:
        velocity - the speed at which to move

      • sendTurn

        void sendTurn(int velocity,
              int angle)
        Instructs the robot to make a zero-point turn.
        Parameters:
        velocity - the angular velocity at which to rotate
        angle - the amount to rotate

      • sendReset

        void sendReset()
        Instructs the robot to stop, cancelling previous instructions.
